definitions: marked with or encircled by a ring or rings

examples.text: a long, ringed tail similar to a tabby cat

shortDefinitions: marked with or encircled by ring or rings

definitions: (of a planet) having a thin band or disk of rock and ice particles formed in its orbit

examples.text: the probe will study the ringed planet for four years

shortDefinitions: (of planet) having thin band or disc of rock and ice particles formed in its orbit

definitions: wearing a ring, as an ornament or a token of marriage, engagement, or authority

examples.text: they wore suits with the sleeves pulled back to show ringed fingers

definitions: (of a bird) having an aluminium strip secured around a leg as a means of identification

examples.text: ringed birds have been recovered in winter

shortDefinitions: (of bird) having aluminium strip secured round leg for identification
